DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : Primary - To assess serum lycopene epigallocatechin-3-gallate ( green tea ) level 6 month follow randomization patient prostate cancer previously enrol ProtecT Secondary - To evaluate trial recruitment randomization rate patient treated regimen . - To evaluate intervention tolerability patient treat regimen . - To evaluate compliance patient treat regimen . - To evaluate trial retention patient treat regimen . - To assess PSA value patient treat regimen . - To evaluate dietary compliance recommendation patient treat regimen . - To assess weight body mass index patient treat regimen . - To evaluate attitude view men spouse dietary modification participation long-term study . OUTLINE : Patients stratify accord PSA test level obtain ProtecT study recruitment clinic ( < 3.0 ng/mL vs 3.0-19.99 ng/mL ) . Patients randomize 1 2 treatment arm .
